comments.content:
Our Jira system is not a support portal. Instead, you should discuss your problem on the solr-user mailing list (see https://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc for subscription information). If a bug is found, you'll be encouraged to create a new issue at that time.

When you ask your question on the mailing list, please be sure to include more information than you've provided here, such as the version of Solr you're using, how you started Solr, how you created a collection, as well as full output of log files (see https://lucene.apache.org/solr/guide/installing-solr.html#installing-solr for information about Solr's directory layout and where to find log files).
